sentence: Riggleman is listed as a sponsor of a fundraiser for Rep. Liz Cheney (R-WY), despite how he works as an advisor for the January 6 select committee, where Cheney serves as vice chair.
author: Rebecca Downs
title: Former Rep. Hosting Fundraiser for Liz Cheney, Even Though He Works for Jan. 6 Select Committee
